Docs.summary: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source. Provides a base class for database-specific classes that represent commands.

Docs.summary: Attempts to cancels the execution of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要取消項目，會發生任何事。 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。

Docs.value: 要執行的文字命令。 預設值為空字串 ("")。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將<xref:System.Data.CommandType>至`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>預存程序名稱的屬性。 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個`Execute`方法。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
Docs.value: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ArgumentException>如果就會產生受指派<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>屬性值小於 0。
請注意，實作者注意事項中,，建議您使用 0 表示無逾時。

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(valuetype System.Data.CommandBehavior behavior, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

abstract member ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync : System.Data.CommandBehavior * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> override this.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync : System.Data.CommandBehavior * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

Docs.param: Options for statement execution and data retrieval.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary: Providers should implement this method to provide a non-default implementation for overloads. The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread. The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token. Exceptions thrown by ExecuteReader will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property. This method accepts a cancellation token that can be used to request the operation to be cancelled early. Implementations may ignore this request.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

Docs.exception: An error occurred while executing the command text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteNonQuery () As Integer

Docs.summary: Executes a SQL statement against a connection object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表），或執行 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE 陳述式來變更資料庫中的資料。
雖然<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>不傳回任何資料列、 任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。
UPDATE、 INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式的傳回值會是命令影響的資料列數目。 對於所有其他陳述式類型，傳回的值為-1。

Docs.summary: This method implements the asynchronous version of , but returns a synchronously, blocking the calling thread.

Docs.exception: An error occurred while executing the command text.

Docs.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary: This is the asynchronous version of . Providers should override with an appropriate implementation. The cancellation token may optionally be ignored. The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread. The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token. Exceptions thrown by will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property. Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

Docs.exception: An error occurred while executing the command text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

Docs.summary: Executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. All other columns and rows are ignored.
Docs.returns: The first column of the first row in the result set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。 這需要較少的程式碼比使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法與執行以產生單一值使用所傳回的資料所需的作業<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>。
如果結果集中的第一個資料列的第一個資料行沒有找到，則為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 會傳回。 如果資料庫中的值是`null`，此查詢會傳回`DBNull.Value`。

Docs.summary: Implements the asynchronous version of , but returns a synchronously, blocking the calling thread.

Docs.summary: This is the asynchronous version of . Providers should override with an appropriate implementation. The cancellation token may optionally be ignored. The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A>屬性設定為`TableDirect`，`Prepare`不做任何動作。 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A>設`StoredProcedure`，呼叫`Prepare`應該會成功，但它可能會不導致任何作業。
